help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: <button data-token="--color-primary" class="inline-flex h-10 items-center justify-center rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focu
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.4 (foreground color: #070707, background color: #2a6df4, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
